editorschoice1.title: (early) PGA Championship Picks
editorschoice1.keywords: PGA Golf Talk • Trendy Golf Talk
editorschoice1.desc: The PGA Championship is quite a bit away, but I wanted to express my excitement for the first major in a while by writing a blog post talking about my picks for golfers to win and play good in the competition.

editorschoice2.title: The Best 6 Putting Drills
editorschoice2.desc: Here I talk about my favorite 6 putting tips, I included 3 you can do at home while quarantining and 3 you can do when you finally get to the course next! Putting is also one of the most important techniques to master in golfing.

large.title: How to break 100?
large.desc: The average golfer can't break 100. I believe that if you read this guide of 10 tips to breaking 100, you will be able to 100 with a bit of practice and a couple of rounds of applying these concepts
